resources.string:
1) Start the game with a country name starting with an 'A'. 

2) Enter the entire sequence of words in each turn. 

3) Enter a new country starting with the last alphabet of the previous word. 

4) Score is computed according to the strength of each value. 

5) A player can declare at any time and will be locked out of the game. Player is automatically locked out on entering incorrect sequence"/>
